bug.author: dgg32
bug.summary: In "Transfer learning in text" tutorial, the "dls.show_batch()" show wrong outputs
bug.description:
I am following the <denchmark-link:https://docs.fast.ai/tutorial.text>Beginner tutorial</denchmark-link> . When I run the code both in my local machine in Colab, several times, the output of cell 5 "dls.show_batch()" are wrong (screenshot below), from the second item downwards they are all "xxpad xxpad xxpad xxpad xxpad xxpad". These are also different from what the tutorial page showed: My run: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1873196/97348172-1748c600-188e-11eb-8d88-778c26505580.png></denchmark-link>
Tutorial page: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1873196/97348522-8cb49680-188e-11eb-8302-e8a77bde1ea7.png></denchmark-link>
What is the cause of this issue please?

comments.comment: I am able to reproduce this issue in my local environment.
